verses.verse: Now in the first <WH259> year <WH8141> of Cyrus <WH3566> king <WH4428> of Persia, <WH6539> that the word <WH1697> of Yahweh <WH3068> by the mouth <WH6310> of Jeremiah <WH3414> might be accomplished, <WH3615> Yahweh <WH3068> stirred up <WH5782> the spirit <WH7307> of Cyrus <WH3566> king <WH4428> of Persia, <WH6539> so that he made a proclamation <WH5674> throughout all his kingdom, <WH4438> and put it also in writing, <WH4385> saying, <WH559>

"Thus says <WH559> Cyrus <WH3566> king <WH4428> of Persia, <WH6539> <WH3068> 'Yahweh, the God <WH430> of heaven, <WH8064> has given <WH5414> me all the kingdoms <WH4467> of the earth; <WH776> and he has commanded <WH6485> me to build <WH1129> him a house <WH1004> in Jerusalem, <WH3389> which is in Judah. <WH3063>

Whoever there is among you of all his people, <WH5971> may his God <WH430> be with him, <WH5927> and let him go up to Jerusalem, <WH3389> which is in Judah, <WH3063> and build <WH1129> the house <WH1004> of Yahweh, <WH3068> the God <WH430> of Israel <WH3478> (he is God <WH430>), which is in Jerusalem. <WH3389>

Whoever is left, <WH7604> in any place <WH4725> where he lives, <WH1481> let the men <WH582> of his place <WH4725> help <WH5375> him with silver, <WH3701> with gold, <WH2091> with goods, <WH7399> and with animals, <WH929> besides the freewill offering <WH5071> for the house <WH1004> of God <WH430> which is in Jerusalem. <WH3389>'"

Then the heads <WH7218> of fathers <WH1>' households of Judah <WH3063> and Benjamin, <WH1144> and the priests, <WH3548> and the Levites, <WH3881> even all whose spirit <WH7307> God <WH430> had stirred <WH5782> to go up <WH5927> rose up <WH5927> to build <WH1129> the house <WH1004> of Yahweh <WH3068> which is in Jerusalem. <WH3389>

All those who were around <WH5439> them strengthened <WH2388> their hands <WH3027> with vessels <WH3627> of silver, <WH3701> with gold, <WH2091> with goods, <WH7399> and with animals, <WH929> and with precious things, <WH4030> besides all that was willingly offered. <WH5068>

Also Cyrus <WH3566> the king <WH4428> brought forth <WH3318> the vessels <WH3627> of the house <WH1004> of Yahweh, <WH3068> which Nebuchadnezzar <WH5019> had brought out <WH3318> of Jerusalem, <WH3389> and had put <WH5414> in the house <WH1004> of his gods; <WH430>

even those, <WH3566> Cyrus king <WH4428> of Persia <WH6539> brought out <WH3318> by the hand <WH3027> of Mithredath <WH4990> the treasurer, <WH1489> and numbered <WH5608> them to Sheshbazzar, <WH8339> the prince <WH5387> of Judah. <WH3063>
This is the number <WH4557> of them: <WH7970> thirty platters <WH105> of gold, <WH2091> one thousand <WH505> platters <WH105> of silver, <WH3701> twenty <WH6242> - nine <WH8672> knives, <WH4252>

thirty <WH7970> bowls <WH3713> of gold, <WH2091> silver <WH3701> bowls <WH3713> of a second <WH4932> sort four <WH702> hundred <WH3967> and ten, <WH6235> and other <WH312> vessels <WH3627> one thousand. <WH505>

All the vessels <WH3627> of gold <WH2091> and of silver <WH3701> were five <WH2568> thousand <WH505> and four <WH702> hundred. <WH3967> Sheshbazzar <WH8339> brought all these up, <WH5927> when the captives <WH1473> were brought up <WH5927> from Babylon <WH894> to Jerusalem. <WH3389>
